h2_title: Cloudtreading Deer Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Cloudtreading Deer
Cloudtreading Deer is one of the main Yaoguai Chiefs you'll need to find in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This two-phase fight will have you facing frost and poison, in order to get a key piece of Wukong's armor.
## Cloudtreading Deer Boss Fight and Guide

It will start by attacking with its horns, sweeping at you to try and hit you. It will also rear up, and hold itself for a few seconds, before slamming down and sending out ripples of frost damage. If you get behind it, just like the Rhino, it will buck to kick you with its hind legs.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from the Cloudtreading Deer boss fight in Chapter 6 of the game Black Myth: Wukong. The Cloudtreading Deer, a significant Yaoguai Chief, is shown amidst a frosty landscape, likely unleashing a frost attack as described in the preceding text. This visual captures the intensity and danger of the battle, highlighting the deer's formidable presence and the environmental effects of its attacks. The image serves to illustrate the challenging nature of this two-phase fight, where players must overcome frost and poison to obtain a key piece of Wukong's armor.
